name: Polygon RPG (demo)
description:
An old project that unfortunately was incomplete but showed alot of promise. The original idea was to be an open world Stylised Role Playing Game where youd have a main story based on what faction was chosen with hundreds of side quests. The scope was too big for a single developer but I did manage to create this little demo.

Controls:
WASD - movement
Shift - sprint
Tab - Lock on to enemy
left click - attack
right click (hold) - block
spacebar - roll
Shift + spacebar - Jump

Shift + left click - heavy swing attack
Control + left click - lunge attack
